Crimes.Crime_Name: Making False Statements to Immigration Officers
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative credibility finding due to contradictions and use of fraudulent documents
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Oral testimony, documentary evidence, POE notes
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Inconsistencies in statements about political affiliations and use of fraudulently obtained documents
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to object to Guideline 7 at the hearing
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Patent unreasonableness standard for credibility findings
Crimes.Application_Factor: Use of false documents and inconsistent narratives
Crimes.Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Alleged bias, procedural unfairness, unreasonable credibility assessment
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Lack of credibility due to omissions and inconsistencies
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Contradictions in testimony and late disclosure of document use
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: No breach found; failure to raise objection constitutes waiver
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Multiple inconsistencies in narrative regarding political involvement and travel history
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claimant challenged credibility findings and alleged procedural bias
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Application of Guideline 7 without timely objection
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose use of false passport and prior travel

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Relevance of false passport use to credibility
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative inference drawn from delayed admission of false passport use
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Admission of false passport use only after being confronted
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to proactively disclose use of false travel document
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Patent unreasonableness standard for credibility findings
Crimes.Application_Factor: Use of false passport while fleeing Kosovo
Crimes.Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Fairness and reasonableness of credibility finding based on false passport
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Credibility undermined by concealment of false passport use
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Timing and manner of disclosure during interview
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose use of false passport at outset

Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to Claim Refugee Status in France
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Bias, credibility, and procedural fairness regarding failure to claim asylum in France
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative credibility findings based on failure to seek protection in France
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Travel records, POE notes, oral testimony
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Two-month stay in France without seeking asylum
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to explain or object to use of Guideline 7
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Patent unreasonableness standard for credibility findings
Crimes.Application_Factor: Stay in safe third country without claiming protection
Crimes.Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Alleged bias, credibility assessment, application of Guideline 7
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Failure to seek asylum in France despite opportunity
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Reliance on POE notes and lack of explanation for inaction in France
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: No breach; failure to object waived issue
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Inconsistent explanation for not claiming refugee status in France
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Argument that Board applied Guideline 7 unfairly
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Use of Guideline 7 without contemporaneous objection
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to claim asylum in a safe third country
